value.name: Ethics Bowl
value.description: The Santa Clara University Ethics Bowl team is coached by Erin Bradfield, lecturer in Philosophy, and Erick Ramirez, Assistant Professor of Philosophy. For more information on joining or supporting the team, please email ejramirez@scu.edu.
